body_html:
The downside of adding it to Variable is that it could lead to confusion to the user, thinking that because doing np.sin(variable) works, then autograd should work on it.
But with the unification of Variable and Tensor, I think we should add it anyway.
body_text:
The downside of adding it to Variable is that it could lead to confusion to the user, thinking that because doing np.sin(variable) works, then autograd should work on it.
But with the unification of Variable and Tensor, I think we should add it anyway.
body:
The downside of adding it to `Variable` is that it could lead to confusion to the user, thinking that because doing `np.sin(variable)` works, then autograd should work on it.
But with the unification of `Variable` and `Tensor`, I think we should add it anyway.
